tool_description: Knowvent's API is a cloud-based heartbeat monitor and notifications hub for your business. With Knowvent developers can easily publish events to the business. Business managers can subscribe to those events they care the most about.  With Knowvent, email notifications are a thing of the past.
name: Knowvent
title: Knowvent

api_list.name: Send Pulse
api_list.description: Used to keep Knowvent informed that your critical processes are running.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://knowvent.p.rapidapi.com/Heartbeat/SendPulse"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "knowvent.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: SetStatus
api_list.description: Used to update knowvent when a process starts or shuts down gracefully
api_list.code:
